name: Reartext Implementations for BADEL
short_description: Reartext is a SuperWikia Alpha kernel used to build BADEL bulkhead implementations. It simplifies implementation by using Alpha language retrofits to process bulk commands and allows SuperWikia Logic referencing via end user RearText dataplate U/I.
